entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Minnedosa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
